Initializer# init(source:intensityExponent:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    source: ImageBasedLightComponent.Source,
    intensityExponent: Float = 0
)
```
